title: ORTC/WebRTC: add VP8 RTP PictureID
body:
Hello,
it seems that ORTC/WebRTC stack does not add VP8 RTP PictureID [1] which is needed by Switching Mixer Media Servers [2] to properly perform its rewriting when RTP flow switchings take place in order to avoid some issues in clients (eg: Chrome) that depend on it.

comments.body: if this is done then please only use two-byte picture ids as alternating between one and two bytes is expensive for servers that rewrite the picture id. See https://bugs.chromium.org/p/webrtc/issues/detail?id=7877 for rationale of a similar chrome change
